The ticket is dated August 6: 2020, and is for the Pune Junction railway station in the city of Pune, India.
India: s Ministry of Railways responded directly to the claim on Twitter on August 17, 2020, stating that the purpose of raising the platform ticket price to 50 rupees at Pune Junction was to maintain social distancing during the coronavirus pandemic.
There are no credible reports indicating: The station remains under the authority of the Indian Railway Stations Development Corporation.
